verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> there was הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Again there was a day וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> when the sons הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> to present עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> themselves before the LORD וַיָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> came גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הַשָּׂטָן֙ <S%H7854><s%> and Satan בְּתֹכָ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> also among לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> them to present עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> himself before the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> From whence מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> have you תָּבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> comest וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <S%H7854><s%> thou? And Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said מִשֻּׁ֣ט <S%H7751><s%> From going to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וּמֵהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and from walking up and down בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan הֲשַׂ֣מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> Hast thou לִבְּךָ֮ <S%H3820><s%> considered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant אִיּוֹב֒ <S%H347><s%> Job כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> is no כָּמֹ֜הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [there is] none like him in the earth אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man תָּ֧ם <S%H8535><s%> a perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> and an upright יְרֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> one that feareth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וְסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> and escheweth מֵרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil וְעֹדֶ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H5750><s%> still מַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> holds בְּתֻמָּת֔וֹ <S%H8538><s%> his integrity וַתְּסִיתֵ֥נִי <S%H5496><s%> although thou movedst ב֖וֹ לְבַלְּע֥וֹ <S%H1104><s%> me against him to destroy חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> him without cause

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <S%H7854><s%> And Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said ע֣וֹר <S%H5785><s%> Skin בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> for ע֗וֹר <S%H5785><s%> for skin וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> yea all that a man יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> hath will he give בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> for his life

אוּלָם֙ <S%H199><s%> But שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> put forth נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וְגַ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> now and touch אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַצְמ֖וֹ <S%H6106><s%> his bone וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and בְּשָׂר֑וֹ <S%H1320><s%> and his flesh אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thee to thy face יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> and he will curse

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan הִנּ֣וֹ <S%H2005><s%> behold בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> Behold he [is] in thine hand אַ֖ךְ <S%H389><s%> only אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his life שְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> but save

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> forth הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> Satan מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִיּוֹב֙ <S%H347><s%> Job בִּשְׁחִ֣ין <S%H7822><s%> boils רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> with sore מִכַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> from the sole רַגְל֖וֹ <S%H7272><s%> of his foot [עַד כ] (וְעַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against ק) קָדְקֳדֽוֹ׃ <S%H6936><s%> unto his crown

וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> And he took ל֣וֹ חֶ֔רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> him a potsherd לְהִתְגָּרֵ֖ד <S%H1623><s%> to scrape בּ֑וֹ וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> himself withal and he sat down בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> among הָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> the ashes

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said לוֹ֙ אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife עֹדְךָ֖ <S%H5750><s%> still מַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> unto him Dost thou still retain בְּתֻמָּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8538><s%> integrity בָּרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> abundantly אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וָמֻֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and die

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> But he said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> unto her Thou speakest אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> as one הַנְּבָלוֹת֙ <S%H5036><s%> of the foolish women תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <S%H1696><s%> speaketh גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> indeed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַטּ֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good נְקַבֵּל֙ <S%H6901><s%> and shall we not receive מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> at the hand of God וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not נְקַבֵּ֑ל <S%H6901><s%> accept בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָטָ֥א <S%H2398><s%> sin אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <S%H8193><s%> with his lips פ

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת ׀ <S%H7969><s%> three רֵעֵ֣י <S%H7453><s%> friends אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Now when Job's אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָרָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> of all this evil הַזֹּאת֮ <S%H2063><s%> that הַבָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> that was come עָלָיו֒ <S%H5921><s%> upon וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> upon him they came אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מִמְּקֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> from his own place אֱלִיפַ֤ז <S%H464><s%> Eliphaz הַתֵּימָנִי֙ <S%H8489><s%> the Temanite וּבִלְדַּ֣ד <S%H1085><s%> and Bildad הַשּׁוּחִ֔י <S%H7747><s%> the Shuhite וְצוֹפַ֖ר <S%H6691><s%> and Zophar הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֑י <S%H5284><s%> the Naamathite וַיִּוָּעֲד֣וּ <S%H3259><s%> for they had made an appointment יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together לָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come לָנֽוּד־ <S%H5110><s%> to mourn ל֖וֹ וּֽלְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <S%H5162><s%> with him and to comfort

וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> And when they lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes מֵרָחוֹק֙ <S%H7350><s%> afar off וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not הִכִּירֻ֔הוּ <S%H5234><s%> and knew וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> him not they lifted up קוֹלָ֖ם <S%H6963><s%> their voice וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept וַֽיִּקְרְעוּ֙ <S%H7167><s%> and they rent אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מְעִל֔וֹ <S%H4598><s%> his mantle וַיִּזְרְק֥וּ <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkled עָפָ֛ר <S%H6083><s%> dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads הַשָּׁמָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H8064><s%> toward heaven

וַיֵּשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> So they sat down אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> on לָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> with him upon the ground שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְשִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> and seven לֵיל֑וֹת <S%H3915><s%> nights וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no דֹּבֵ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> and none spake אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> a word כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> unto him for they saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָדַ֥ל <S%H1431><s%> great הַכְּאֵ֖ב <S%H3511><s%> that [his] grief מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> was very
